div.p: I worked in retail and watching people basically the general public going round and I thought you know you get the gist of people acting suspiciously
possible shoplifters and I thought yeah I could possibly... Well I want to be a security officer yeah, yeah and it was quite not for everybody but
in retail it can be quite mundane but I wanted something challenging so I thought yeah I’ll be a security officer.
People have this perception that being a security officer is mundane you know they sit in the office, they put their feet up, possibly fall asleep at night
but it’s not the case, your mind’s always working watching CCTV or walking round and every day can be different, some days are the same
but there’s always that aspect that something might happen.
